name: DailySignal
text:
Why is @DonLemon so deeply invested in preventing conversations about black lives? 

Why, in fact, do only some black lives matter—rather than all? 

Not all black lives matter to #BlackLivesMatter @benshapiro https://t.co/oz3KkiCQeG

name: DailySignal
text: The U.S. must marshal its resources and commit to long-term engagement to meet the challenges posed by China—now and in the future. https://t.co/1r0UhIvB8b

name: DailySignal
text: “The stakes in this struggle couldn’t be higher. The philosophy taught in the classroom in this generation will be the philosophy practiced in the legislature in the next generation.” https://t.co/w4k8WMUi22

name: DailySignal
text: RT @Virginia_Allen5: #SCOTUS gave these servant hearted women a major victory this week but the fight is likely not over. @AmySwearer explains why. https://t.co/Oq8RPRaCq9 via @laurenelizevans @DailySignal

name: DailySignal
text:
Newton Falls, Ohio is now a “sanctuary city” for statues being toppled in other parts of the country.

A proclamation signed July 4 by City Manager David Lynch declares that monuments of the Founding Fathers and others will find safety in Newton Falls: https://t.co/58kNAkLYv2

name: DailySignal
text:
Rewriting history does nothing to improve the quality of life for disadvantaged individuals. 

If the #1619Project creators want to change the future, shouldn't they be promoting policies proven to create opportunities—not further divide us? https://t.co/EYOjJOp7bY
